price: У томе је, заиста, знак, али већина њих нису били верници.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
